sense.name: challenge a legal verdict
sense.examples: The soft drink maker is expected to appeal the case. He is now appealing to the state Supreme Court in this custody battle. I doubt the defendant can appeal this verdict.

sense.name: request earnestly of someone
sense.commentary: NP1[agent] APPEAL TO NP2[patient] PP{P NP[theme]} NP1[agent] APPEAL TO NP2[patient] SCOMP[theme]
sense.examples: I appeal to you not to shoot the bear! The Pilgrims appealed to God to give them safe passage. The neighbors heard the child appealing for help.

sense.name: attract or please
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[theme1] APPEAL TO NP2[theme2[human]]
sense.examples: Living by the ocean really appeals to me. Eating Chinese tonight doesn't appeal to John. Outsourcing non-core business activities has been appealing to many companies.

sense.name: cite or refer to something
sense.examples: He appealed to the Fifth Amendment in his defense. The EPA has appealed to several studies that cite evidence of global warming.
